ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] fear kiting
ygData.msgSnippet: Just pull it back closer to the zone ;o)  I m thinking of trying out the tunnel opening that leads to Dreadlands, you might want to look into it too. (On
ygData.messageBody:
Just pull it back closer to the zone ;o) I'm thinking of trying out the
tunnel opening that leads to Dreadlands, you might want to look into it too.
(On Rathe, there's rarely more than one or two other folks there, they all
seem to congregate at the giant fortress.)


-=B=-
(see below ;p )
----- Original Message -----
From: Kimes, Dean W. <dean_kimes@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 07, 2000 9:54 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] fear kiting


> Been searching for a Roamer free area in FM, the ledge by Lake is being
used

> fearing their mobs ;-p
> Know any other roamer free areas in FM?
>
> Kitasi Faegehearper

to
